content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
GO

-- Changed to use the abfss protocol
-- HEADER_ROW set to TRUE, Row and Field terminators set
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
GO

-- Examine the data types for the columns
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'
GO

-- Specify the length of columns
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationId)) AS len_LocationId,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) AS len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) AS len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]
GO

-- Use WITH clause to provide explicit data types
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]
GO

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]'
GO

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

-- Specify UTF-8 Collation for VARCHAR columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]
GO

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;
GO

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
GO


SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]
GO

-- Select only subset of columns 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50)
    )AS [result]         
GO

-- Read data from a file without header
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2
    )
AS [result]     
GO

-- Fix Column Names
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]
GO

-- Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/'
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw' 
)
GO

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]
GO

-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data

SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources;
